title: Screamer Radio 0.4.4 - Build (06.2016)
description:
OS: XP/Vista/7/8.1/10
Language: Multilingual
Install Notes: Two versions with different DI.FM radio access.

Added and updated the following radio stations:
 â€¢ By Network: Digitally Imported DI.FM - fully, Radio Tunes (formerly SKY.FM) - partially with 8 stations, AddictedToRadio, 1.FM, ProFM. 
 â€¢ By Category: Partially updated "Electronic" section. The channels here are sorted by kind of style and popularity, not by alphabet. A few channels still not responding. 
 â€¢ By Country: Fully updated Bulgarian stations.

Why to use Screamer Radio:
 â€¢ It's easy to use
 â€¢ It's not bloated
 â€¢ It's ad free
 â€¢ It has no spyware
 â€¢ It has a huge database of radio stations
 â€¢ It has a cool peak meter ;)
 â€¢ You can easily record what you're listening to
 â€¢ You can hide it in the system tray
 â€¢ You can play back on multiple soundcards
 â€¢ .. and it's free!

Supported Stream Types:
 â€¢ Shoutcast and Icecast MP3 Streaming
 â€¢ Icecast OGG Vorbis Streaming
 â€¢ WMA Streaming
 â€¢ AAC Streaming

Recording Features:
 â€¢ Recording buffer: start recording in the middle and still save the entire song!
 â€¢ Direct MP3 Audio stream saving, no loss of quality!
 â€¢ Direct OGG Vorbis stream saving, no loss of quality!
 â€¢ Or encode OGG Vorbis as MP3 using Lame
 â€¢ Encode WMA or AAC to MP3 using Lame
